import React, { Component } from 'react' import { newVisitor } from './VisitorFunctions' class NewVisitor extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', phone: '', company_name: '', password: '', errors: {} } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const newVisitor = { name: this.state.name, email: this.state.email, phone: this.state.phone, address: this.state.address, purpose: this.state.purpose } newVisitor(newVisitor).then(res => { this.props.history.push(`/`) }) } render() { return (

Visitor Registration

) } } export default NewVisitor
